title: Us & Them
resume: Us & Them is an American television series, based on the British series "Gavin & Stacey" created by James Corden and Ruth, that was supposed to premiere on Fox in the 2013-2014 season. In summer 2014, Vulture revealed that Fox would not air the show. The series was broadcast in South Africa.
